Name: Frog Detective 2: The Case of the Invisible Wizard
About the game: ☆★☆★ ...something debatably wicked this way comes... ★☆★☆ ☻ 1 hour estimated completion time ☻ The famed Frog Detective returns in the most thrilling mystery yet! A town’s welcoming celebration for a mysterious Invisible Wizard has been ripped to shreds by an unknown culprit. The Detective must find out “whodunnit”! The Case of the Invisible Wizard is the second game in the Frog Detective series, following The Haunted Island , which was loved by all.* *(Except for one user on Steam who called it “a middle finger and a waste of $5”, but we can’t win em all.)
